repnme.cdata!:
Venezuela - Technical Assistance Project
            For Preinvestment and Institutional Development

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the project are to:
            (a) provide financing to build up a pipeline of projects
            suitable for financial assistance from the Bank; (b)
            strengthen the Government's capacity to undertake sound
            investment projects; (c) strengthen Government financial
            management; and (d) help implement the public enterprise
            reform program. The two main focuses of the project are
            preinvestment and institutional development. The project
            comprises the following: (a) preinvestment activities and
            institutional restructuring, required to prepare investment
            projects; (b) strengthening of the Central Coordinating and
            Planning Office of the President (CORDIPLAN) in areas
            relating to internal organization, macro-economic planning
            and management, sectoral policy formulation, public
            investment evaluation and programming; (c) strengthening of
            key sectoral ministries in sectoral policy planning, project
            identification and selection; (d) strengthening the Central
            Budget Office; (e) assistance to the Ministry of Finance to
            strengthen internal organization, accounting and information
            management, expenditure control and monitoring in Treasury,
            and tax administration reform actions; (f) Public Enterprise
            Reform Loan (PERL) related restructuring and privatization
            activities and a review of the financial, legal and tutelary
            relationships within the public enterprise sector; and (g)
            strengthening of CORDIPLAN's capacity to manage the
            proposed project.
